DOC.brief_summary: The aim study investigate potential beneficial effect wholegrain body weight composition well cardiovascular risk overweight woman .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Wholegrain Wheat Body Weight Composition Cardiovascular Risk
DOC.detailed_description: Objective : To study effect 'wholegrain concept ' , i.e . high intake wheat wholegrain ( WW ) vs. refine wheat ( RW ) grain product body weight composition . Design : In open-labeled randomized trial , 72 postmenopausal woman metabolic syndrome feature prescribe mild calorie-restricted diet deficit ~1,250kJ/d . Following 2 week run-in period RW product , randomize 12 week intervention RW WW product provide 2,000kJ/d .
DOC.criteria: BMI 2737 Postmenopausal ( > 1y ) woman 4070 year old Medication ( hypertensive treatment include ) BP > 160/100 Fasting glucose > 7mM Fasting cholesterol > 6.5mM Smoking Known chronic illness
